niwarana yatapath wi kusala muladharma pahala wenawa.ape lowthura budurajanan wahansege prathama mangala deshanawe di daha ata kotiyak dewiyan brahmayin arhathwata path wu bawath, asankheyyak sowan, sakrudagami, anagami marga gnyanayen niwan awabodha karagath bawath dharmaye sandahan wenawa.baranas nuwarin aarambha kala deshanawa parinirwanayata path wenathuru dharma deshana karamin athimahath sewayak kala.

ada kiyanna yanne jana kathawak.kathawa aathal nisath hunga kalekata kalin mama ahala thibunu nisath kathawa oogollontath kiyanna hithuna.meka kiyawana kathawa kalin ahapu kattiya innawanan sori wenna oona.eka gamaka hitiya upasaka mahaththayek.hathara poyatama sil gaththa ee upasaka mahaththayata bana daham gana puduma danumak thibuna.me upasaka mahaththayage podi adupaduwakata thibune suduwata thibun gijukama witharayi.eeth game hari langapatha hari suduwata yanne na.kawadawath polisiyata ahuwelath na.dinuwath ekayi paradunath ekayi.kohomahari game minissu meka danagena hitiye na.eka dawasak aatha gamaka suduwata giya welawe sudu polra hitiya anith ayath ekka upasaka mahaththayath polisiyata ahuwuna.polisiye lokka hari sarayi.katawath apa dunneth na.eda handawe kuduwe hitiya buru nade eliyata aragena "umbaala buruwa gahuwa neda?"
